Context¶

metaknowledge is a python library for creating and analyzing scientific metadata. It uses records obtained from Web of Science (WOS), Scopus and other sources. It is intended to be usable by those who do not know much python. This page will be a short overview of its capabilities, to allow you to use it for your own work. For complete coverage of the package as well as install instructions read the full the documentation here THIS NEEDS TO LINK TO THE FULL DOCUMENTATION ON RTD.

This document was made from a jupyter notebook, if you know how to use them, you can download the notebook here and the sample file is here if you wish to have an interactive version of this page. Now let’s begin.
